body.name: Darkant Stick Printer, Mini Thermal Printer, Portable Pocket Inkless Sticker for School Note, Photo, Bluetooth Sticker Printer Machine with Android & iOS Mobile

features: 🎁Delightful Gifts for Your Kids - Unleash your creativity with this versatile mini pocket printer. From printing black and white photos to creating sticky notes, scrapbooks, memos, labels, and more, it's a magical sticker maker machine that sparks imagination and encourages engaging parent-child activities. This compact and intelligent thermal printer is an excellent gifting choice for children, students, teachers, and DIY enthusiasts, ideal for occasions like Christmas, Children's Day, or Thanksgiving Day.

🥇Print Instantly Anywhere, Anytime - With the "WalkPrint" app, effortlessly connect your portable printer wirelessly via Bluetooth, and unleash your printing desires whenever inspiration strikes. This convenient travel wireless printer can complete a printing task in just 10 seconds. While it's compatible with all smartphones, please note that it does not support computer devices. The sticker maker machine is equipped with a 1000mAh rechargeable battery, ensuring it remains operational for an entire week on a single full charge, making it perfect for your on-the-go lifestyle!

✅Cost-Effective and Eco-Friendly Sticker Printer - Our mini pocket printer offers adjustable print density and is compatible with various 57*30mm thermal paper types. It utilizes thermal imaging technology for fast 300dpi HD printing and eliminates the need for toner, ink, and ribbons. This inkless printer only requires environmentally friendly thermal paper, making it a budget-friendly and eco-conscious choice.

🎉What's Included - You'll receive one Mini Pocket Printer, along with 3 rolls of color thermal printing paper, 2 rolls of label paper, 1 roll of regular thermal paper, 1 USB cable, and user manual. With its powerful features, the printer offers limitless creativity, allowing you to bring your unique creations to life. Explore a wide selection of templates, graphics, and fonts to personalize your prints and let your imagination run wild.

💗Your satisfaction is our top priority - We are fully dedicated to providing exceptional support throughout your journey. Our committed customer care team is here to promptly address any questions or concerns you may have. Rest assured, we are honored to assist you and are committed to making your experience with us flawless. Feel confident reaching out to us anytime, as we strive to ensure your satisfaction and deliver nothing short of excellence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This mini printer sometimes does not print very clearly, what is the reason? The reason is that the printer uses thermal paper printing technology and the photo may be exposed when the user takes a photo, resulting in blurred photos, if the photo is taken in normal light, the print will be clear enough. How does this mini printer work? First, switch on the mini printer and enable Bluetooth on your phone. Open the "Walkprint" app, choose the printer, and it's ready to use after connecting. Why print on thermal paper instead of ink? I think ink is much clearer. The product was selected for thermal printing because it can give users easy to use, can be carried around, and can save costs, do not have to buy special ink. How can I turn to if I have a problem? If you have any suggestions for the product, feel free to contact Darkant, we will do our best to help you solve the problem, to ensure that every customer can be 100% satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Gift Product
reviews.reviewText: Choosing the perfect gift for a friend, I stumbled upon this mini thermal printer, and it turned out to be an absolute gem. Its compact design and stylish aesthetics caught my eye, making it an excellent choice for a versatile and practical present. The prints it produces are of exceptional quality, showcasing sharp details and vibrant colors. I believe this mini thermal printer is not just a gift but a delightful and thoughtful experience waiting to unfold.What sets this mini thermal printer apart is its versatility, making it an ideal gift for various occasions. Whether your friend is a student, a professional, or someone who loves capturing memories on the go, this portable printer seamlessly integrates into their lifestyle. The wireless connectivity options and user-friendly features ensure that even those less tech-savvy can easily navigate and enjoy the benefits of this gadget. Giving this mini thermal printer is not just offering a present; it's presenting an opportunity for creativity, productivity, and a touch of uniqueness.Beyond its practicality, this mini thermal printer adds a fun and personal touch to the act of giving. The ability to print instant photos or personalized notes on the spot transforms the gift-giving experience into a memorable and interactive moment. It's a thoughtful way to encourage creativity and share special memories. I wholeheartedly recommend gifting this mini thermal printer to anyone looking to surprise a loved one with a unique, practical, and creatively inspiring present.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small & sweet thermal printer
reviews.reviewText: Very small, sweet, very durable printer. Best part is, it do not require ink. Its a thermal printer and comes with 5 paper rolls. Very easy to setup n printer app have many features too. It prints only black & white. Quality of printout is also good. Worth the price esp kids love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got this for the birthday of our 4yo.She was so happy. It works nicely, it’s pretty and fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Adorable mini printer! It includes 3 colored papers, 2 sticky sheets, and 1 plain paper. Easy to connect to the app and use. While sharper photo quality would be great, overall, it's a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids get a kick out of printing random stuff and pictures of their silly faces and selfies! Great for printing to-do lists and memes that you want to stick on a wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Originally got this for my daughter but I honestly love it more haha super easy to use and the pics that it prints come out pretty good considering how inexpensive it is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Loved how I easy and simple this was to use! Surprisingly even my 10 year old could do this. Loved this product! It’s a wonderful bday present! 🩷

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thermal printer is great for printing things to place into my journal. It only prints in black and white but works pretty easily with Bluetooth.
